verses.name: Mark 7:27
verses.text: But Jesus said unto her, Let the children first be filled: for it is not meet to take the children’s bread, and to cast it unto the dogs.

verses.name: Mark 7:28
verses.text: And she answered and said unto him, Yes, Lord: yet the dogs under the table eat of the children’s crumbs.

verses.name: Mark 7:29
verses.text: And he said unto her, For this saying go thy way; the devil is gone out of thy daughter.

verses.name: Mark 7:30
verses.text: And when she was come to her house, she found the devil gone out, and her daughter laid upon the bed.
